100 ml/one-tenth of a peck/measure for dry grain equal to one-tenth of sheng 升 or liter, or one-hundredth dou 斗

sentences.english: This Joint Declaration and its Annexes shall be equally binding.
sentences.chinese: 本聯合聲明及其附件具有同等約束力。

sentences.english: It is the first thing highlighted by the two sides in the Joint Statement, according to He Yafei.
sentences.chinese: 這是雙方在聯合聲明中突出的第一條。

sentences.english: Third, the two sides put an emphasis on the economic complementarities of the two countries in the Joint Statement. The two economies are highly complementary.
sentences.chinese: 第三，雙方在聯合聲明中強調兩國經濟優勢互補。

sentences.english: The two sides issued a joint statement on China-Germany relations following the talks.
sentences.chinese: 會談後，雙方發表了關於中德關係的聯合聲明。
